subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams was defeated by Sara Errani in a riveting match, and Angelique Kerber, the No. 6 seed, was dismantled by 17-year-old Belinda Bencic. Simona Halep, the No. 2 seed, also lost. On the men’s side, Roger Federer advanced.
snippet: Venus Williams was defeated by Sara Errani in a riveting match, and Angelique Kerber, the No. 6 seed, was dismantled by 17-year-old Belinda Bencic. Simona Halep, the No. 2 seed, also lost. On the men’s side, Roger Federer advanced.
